name: ALOO PALAK
description: A delicious, wholesome spinach & potato curry - perfect for a cold winter's day.
ingredient3: 450g potatoes, peeled and chopped into quarter circles
ingredient5: 1 tsp each of cumin seeds, coriander powder, red chilli powder, & salt to taste
step1: Add your oil/ghee to a deep pot. On a medium heat, add the onions and fry until they are lightly gold
step2: Add the potatoes, green chilli, ginger, garlic and spices. Give these a quick 3 minute fry, stirring often
step3: Add 1/2 cup of water and your chopped tomatoes. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 10 minutes
step4: Add in the chopped spinach. Simmer this covered with a lid on low for 5 minutes, then uncovered until the moisture from the spinach has been cooked out and there isn't any murky-coloured water left. Instead of stirring, swirl the pot as discussed in the recipe post to ensure the potatoes don't break
